org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.binary

Interface CacheObjectBinaryProcessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GridComponent, GridProcessor, IgniteCacheObjectProcessor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheObjectBinaryProcessorImpl

    public interface CacheObjectBinaryProcessor
extends IgniteCacheObjectProcessor
    Extended cache object processor interface with additional methods for binary.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.ignite.internal.GridComponent

      • addMetaLocally

        void addMetaLocally(int typeId,
                    BinaryType newMeta)
             throws IgniteException
        Adds metadata locally without triggering discovery exchange. Must be used only during startup and only if it is guaranteed that all nodes have the same copy of BinaryType.
        Parameters:
        typeId - Type ID.
        newMeta - New meta data.
        Throws:
        IgniteException - In case of error.
